description: Decorative Ts'ung, translucent pale tan jade, H. 2-3/16 in., Diam. 2-3/4 in. Each of four surfaces has incised animal mask design and a poem by Chien-lung is inscribed within. 'Ceremonial piece-form of Sung broad bracelet-pale cream jade with brown cracks. [Haos ford?] Late Warring States. Probably sung with Chien Lung inscription.'
inscription:
Inscription

Each of four surfaces has incised animal mask design and a poem by Chien-lung is inscribed within. Wording not listed on catalogue card.
title: Cuff
